entry.title: Hiding In Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: aster_ion

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,458Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 170

Summary: Batman is wary of Superman. He doesn't trust the all powerful alien – he's seen firsthand how absolute power can corrupt an individual. It’s only a matter of time before he snaps.Clark Kent is wary of Bruce Wayne. He's met too many men like him – charming, arrogant, and swimming in more money than they know what to do with. He’s hiding something, Clark is sure of it.Bruce would do anything to learn more about the threat Superman poses, so when an unassuming new reporter with mysterious connections to the superhero takes over the Gotham beat, he doesn’t pass up the opportunity.Seducing Clark Kent wasn’t exactly the plan, but hey, Bruce isn’t complaining.

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,165Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 91

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).

entry.title: Godfire
entry.summary:
Author: aestheticallyinspiredhoe

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,648Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Bruce Wayne has always known that he was different. Even as a child, he had inhuman strength and unbearable anger. As he learns more about his own powers and ancestry, he also has to train Dick, who is a mysterious orphan from Greece. When Superman crash lands on Earth as an adult, Bruce takes him under his wing as well.

entry.title: Oooo you wanna kiss me so bad
entry.summary:
Author: iMiss2012fandomVibes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,005Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 36

Summary: “You’re not healing,” Bruce stressed.“I am," said Clark, "it’s just the kryptonite in my bloodstream. When I get back up into the sun it’ll heal faster. I’m still feeling weak and probably can’t fly yet, but I already feel tons better… Thank you."Bruce didn’t respond. He looked at him skeptically before putting his hand over Clark’s, pinning it down to the table.“Push up on my hand.”Sexual tension while stitching up wounds trope. The Kryptonite is a metaphor.

entry.title: Gravity Pull
entry.summary:
Author: lostinreeverie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,276Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 221

Summary: He raised a hand. Placed it gently on Clark’s shoulder, right near the base of his neck. Warm skin under his glove. Just a brief touch. A steady one. And Clark—Clark melted. His breath caught, barely audible, and then he let it out slowly. Like something inside him had come unclenched. His shoulders dropped beneath Bruce’s hand, posture softening almost imperceptibly. He didn’t move away. Didn’t flinch. Bruce went still. Or, Bruce notices Clark might need more than just kindness—and decides to give it to him.
